Package paintingcanvas.painter

Class App

  • java.lang.Object
    • paintingcanvas.painter.App
  • public abstract class App
extends java.lang.Object
    A simpler interface for the painter.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  App.AnimationBuilder
      A builder used to add animations to an element.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static Painter painter
      The global Painter all Drawables access to add themselves to.

      • colorTo

        protected Animation colorTo​(int r,
                            int g,
                            int b)
        Create a new animation to color in RGB. 
        
 Circle o = new Circle(100, 100, 20);
 o.animate().add(colorTo(255, 0, 0), 1);
        Parameters:
        r - The red component of the color (0-255)
        g - The green component of the color (0-255)
        b - The blue component of the color (0-255)
        Returns:
        the Animation object

      • colorTo

        protected Animation colorTo​(java.awt.Color color)
        Create a new animation to color with a Color object. 
        
 Circle o = new Circle(100, 100, 20);
 o.animate().add(colorTo(Color.RED), 1);
        Parameters:
        color - The color to animate to
        Returns:
        the Animation object

      • colorTo

        protected Animation colorTo​(int hex)
        Create a new animation to color with a 8-bit RGB hex literal. 
        
 Circle o = new Circle(100, 100, 20);
 // 0xFF0000 is hex for (255, 0, 0), which is red
 o.animate().add(colorTo(0xFF0000), 1);
        Parameters:
        hex - The color to animate to as a hex literal
        Returns:
        the Animation object

      • moveTo

        protected Animation moveTo​(int x,
                           int y)
        Creates a new position animation to (x, y).
        Parameters:
        x - The absolute x position to animate to
        y - The absolute y position to animate to
        Returns:
        the Animation object

      • rotateTo

        protected Animation rotateTo​(int angle)
        Creates a new rotation animation to angle°. If you supply an angle > 360 it will make more than one full rotation.
        Parameters:
        angle - The absolute angle to rotate to in degrees.
        Returns:
        the Animation object

      • sleep

        protected void sleep​(float time,
                     TimeUnit unit)
        Waits for the specified time.
        Parameters:
        time - Time to wait
        unit - The unit that time is in

      • sleep

        protected void sleep​(float time)
        Waits for the specified time in seconds.
        Parameters:
        time - The time in seconds.
